com.jogamp.opengl.impl.glu.nurbs
Class Quilt

java.lang.Object
  com.jogamp.opengl.impl.glu.nurbs.Quilt

public class Quilt
extends Object

Class for converting NURBS curves and surfaces to list of bezier arcs or patches repectively

Author:
Tomáš Hráský
